amendment.description: To impose withholding on certain payments made by government entities and to use the revenues collected to fund programs under the Low-Income Home Energy Assistance Act of 1981 through a trust fund.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2667 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2667 proposed by Senator Snowe. (consideration: CR S13136-13137; text: CR S13136) To impose withholding on certain payments made by government entities and to use the revenues collected to fund programs under the Low-Income Home Energy Assistance Act of 1981 through a trust fund.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 2667 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2667 proposed by Senator Snowe.
